title: Regarding the Essence emporium
body:
So I just read that you can purchase skin chromas with blue essence through the preseason 8 essence emporium; now is there any released specific information on this? Will we have access to certain chromas, cerain chromas per champ or just all available chromas? I wanna know so I wouldn't waste time farming IP and/or waste RP on chromas.

Thanks!

replies.body: We haven't quite released all of the info concerning that unique shop quite yet. If you're concerned about 'wasting' currency on something right now, it may be a good idea to start hoarding to be sure you can buy what you want from that shop. Also, I'd be sure to check out the news page from time to time as we'll be posting more info as it comes out!

Also, I'd be sure to check out the news page from time to time as we'll be posting more info as it comes out!

Will the full details be released before the shop is available? I'm interested in the money bags and make it rain emotes but I have no idea what they look like or their sound effects, will we get previews closer to time?

Lately, we've been trying to provide all the info up front so that people have time to prepare, so I'm assuming this would be no different. With that being said, I don't even have details about the shop myself right now so it's hard for me to say much. I'm pretty sure we'll get some fancy vids to showcase most of the items that will be in the shop though!

I got ya, thanks for the reply; companies tend to keep everyone in the dark to prevent unwanted leaks. Btw if its not too much trouble to ask, I saw in another thread you were able to see how many games someone has played; I was also curious about my time spent in LoL for the free emote, would you be able to see how many games I have? I sent in a support ticket so I'm hoping in another day or so I'll have an accurate answer of my hours but a general idea would be nice. (But if its too much work for you don't worry about it).

I'm looking through the BE shop list now:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908

...and what are the "Make it Rain" and "Money Bags"-emotes?

What do they look like, and how can they be a whole 50K and 75K BE?
_Because those values seems extremely Sparta to me, to be honest._
